summary: Adds a new craftable Masked Orcish Helmet compatible with all Races.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#66aaaa][size=4]Masked Orcish Helmet[/size][/color]
This mod adds a new standalone craftable Masked version of the Orcish Helmet compatible with all races. I\'ve also included a better fitting female orcish helmet model (See images for comparison) and a higher resolution texture for better alpha transparency (Again, see images).

Now available in a replacer version, which replaces the default helmet with the new masked version.

Note: There will be clipping with beards.

[color=#66aaaa][size=2]Female Shoulder Remolder[/size][/color]
As an optional download, I\'ve uploaded an edited version of the female orcish armor with smaller shoulders. Now you can fit through doorways again! (See images for comparison).



INSTALL

Copy contents of the zip file to your Skyrim Data folder.

Run the launcher and make sure \"OrcishMaskedHelmet.esp\" is selected in the Data files list.

If you haven\'t enabled data files already the option will be greyed out. To enable data files go to to the folder \"Users/*yourname*/My Documents/MyGames/Skyrim\" and look for the file \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\". Open it and find the \"[Launcher]\" section. Under that section, put the line \"bEnableFileSelection=1\" and save the file. The option should no longer be greyed out.

UNINSTALL

Delete the following files:

Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\helmetf.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetf.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetfarg.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetfk.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetforc.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetm.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetmarg.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetmk.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\mhelmetmorc.nif
Data\\textures\\armor\\orcish\\facemask.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\orcish\\facemask_n.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\orcish\\orc_armor_female_helmet_d.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\orcish\\orc_armor_male_helmet_d.dds

and for the Female Shoulder Remolder optional download...

Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\cuirassf_0.nif
Data\\meshes\\armor\\orcish\\cuirassf_1.nif


I require no credit given or permissions asked if you would like to edit any files included in this mod or use them in a mod of your own. Enjoy.
author: Shodan44
